items.question: What is retrieval augmented generation?
items.reference: Retrieval augmented generation combines search over external knowledge with text generation to produce grounded answers.
items.candidate: Retrieval augmented generation combines search over external knowledge with text generation to produce grounded answers.

items.question: Why monitor data quality?
items.reference: Monitoring data quality helps catch drifting sources early and prevents the assistant from returning outdated facts.
items.candidate: Monitoring data quality helps detect drifting sources early and prevents the assistant from returning outdated facts.
